title: Hollywood's Top 10 Leading Women: Icons of Beauty and Talent
content:
Jennifer Lawrence

This talented actress has gained attention for her outstanding performance in the Hunger Games series. Her humor and charismatic personality make her a darling in the eyes of audiences and critics.

Participating movies: X-Men, Black Phoenix, Hunger Games, Playbook, Joey, American Scam, Space Traveler, Mother!, Cardinals.，......



Angelina Jolie

A natural queen of film and television, she is not only known for her acting skills and beauty, but also highly respected for her tireless efforts in charitable causes.

Participating movies:Girl, Interrupted，Gone in Sixty Seconds，Changeling，Salt，The Bone Collector，The Tourist，The Good Shepherd，A Mighty Heart，Beowulf，......



Marion Cotillard

This French actress has won many awards for her outstanding performance and heartfelt portrayal, with unforgettable movies including "Brokeback Mountain" and "Infernal Affairs".

Participating movies:La Vie en Rose，Two Days, One Night，Inception，Rust and Bone，The Little Prince，A Very Long Engagement，Midnight in Paris，Big Fish，Annette，......



Amy Adams

Her passion for acting and professionalism have made her a shining star in Hollywood. She can easily handle both comedy and drama films.

Participating movies:AMERICAN HUSTLE，THE FIGHTER ，DOUBT，ARRIVAL，THE MASTER，ENCHANTED，JUNEBUG，BIG EYES，JULIE AND JULIA，......



Meryl Streep

hailed as a legendary figure in the modern film industry, she has won numerous awards for her numerous classic works and perfect performance skills.

Participating movies:Escape from Extinction Rewilding，Sell/Buy/Date，Don't Look Up，The Prom，Little Women，The Laundromat ， Mary Poppins Returns，Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again，This Changes Everything，......



Anne Hathaway

The versatile Anne Hathaway is highly regarded for her affability and outstanding performances, with outstanding performances in both comedies and musicals.

Participating movies:Rachel Getting Married，Les Misérables，The Dark Knight Rises，Alice in Wonderland，The Devil Wears Prada，The Princess Diaries ，The Witches，Ella Enchanted，Armageddon Time，......



Scarlett Johansson

With her charming appearance and outstanding acting skills, Scarlett Johansson has shown unforgettable performances in multiple blockbusters, becoming one of the hottest actresses in Hollywood.

Participating movies:LOST IN TRANSLATION，AVENGERS: ENDGAME，MARRIAGE STORY，THE JUNGLE BOOK，HER，GHOST WORLD，MARVEL'S THE AVENGERS，CAPTAIN AMERICA: CIVIL WAR，ISLE OF DOGS，......



Megan Fox

The charismatic Megan Fox has won the love of audiences with her sexy image and resilient personality, leaving a profound impression in multiple action movies.

Participating movies:Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen，Transformers，How to Lose Friends & Alienate People，Jennifer's Body， Jonah Hex，Friends with Kids，This Is 40，......



Charlize Theron

Not only is she an outstanding actress, but she is also a strong defender of women's rights. Her superb performance made her a hot favorite in Hollywood.

Participating movies:Fast X (2023)，High & Low - John Galliano，The School for Good and Evil ，F9 The Fast Saga，The Addams Family 2，Long Shot，The Addams Family，Bombshell，Gringo ，......



Jennifer Aniston

As an indispensable part of Friends, Jennifer Aniston showcased her humor and affability, winning the hearts of countless fans. Her career spans across multiple fields, showcasing diverse talents.

Participating movies:Friends with Money，The Good Girl，Murder Mystery，Dumplin，We're the Millers ，Horrible Bosses，Just Go with It，Marley & Me ，The Break-Up，......
section: These actresses have shining performances on the Hollywood stage, each conquering the hearts of the audience with their unique charm and outstanding acting skills. They are not only dazzling stars in film and television works, but also idols and role models in society. Whether through humor, affection, resilience, or sexiness, each of them showcases their unique charm and charm. Through hard work, talent, and steadfast belief, they have become indispensable figures in Hollywood and even the global film industry, showcasing infinite possibilities for us. Let's continue to pay attention to their outstanding performances in the film and television industry, and feel the infinite charm and emotion they bring us.
